text: Dysgonomonas is a Gram-negative and facultatively anaerobic genus from the family of Dysgonamonadaceae which have been isolated from human sources. Dysgonomonas bacteria can cause gastroenteritis in immunocompromised persons ==References== == Further reading == * * * * * * Int J Syst Evol Microbiol. 2000 Nov;50 Pt 6:2189-95 Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria genera
title: Dysgonomonas
